mil4.6:1.1: Thero “sadhu”ti sampaticchitva dasa upasakassa upasakagune paridipesi.
mil4.6:1.3: Katame dasa, idha, maharaja, upasako sanghena samanasukhadukkho hoti, dhammadhipateyyo hoti, yathabalam samvibhagarato hoti, jinasasanaparihanim disva abhivaddhiya vayamati.
mil4.6:1.4: Sammaditthiko hoti, apagatakotuhalamangaliko jivitahetupi na annam sattharam uddisati, kayikavacasikancassa rakkhitam hoti, samaggaramo hoti samaggarato, anusuyako hoti, na ca kuhanavasena sasane carati, buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti.
mil4.6:1.5: Ime kho, maharaja, dasa upasakassa upasakaguna, te sabbe guna tayi samvijjanti, tam te yuttam pattam anucchavikam patirupam yam tvam jinasasanaparihanim disva abhivaddhim icchasi, karomi te okasam, puccha mam tvam yathasukhan”ti.
